metadata.title: CVE-2018-12034 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In YARA 3.7.1 and prior, parsing a specially crafted compiled rule file cancause an out of bounds read vulnerability in yr_execute_code inlibyara/exec.c.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
